singlePlayer

Class Target

  • java.lang.Object
    • singlePlayer.Target

  • public class Target
extends java.lang.Object
    Class implements target used in third level of single player mode.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Target(int HP)
      Constructor initializes the target.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      Decreases target's durability by 1.

      Increases target timer which after exceeding a certain value invokes moveTarget method.

      Moves the target after fixed amount of time.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Target

        public Target(int HP)
        Constructor initializes the target.
        Parameters:
        HP - number of hits it takes to destroy the target

        Draws the target

        public int getTargetHP()

      • moveTarget

        public void moveTarget(java.awt.Rectangle ballRect)
        Moves the target after fixed amount of time. Target cannot move to ball's location.
        Parameters:
        ballRect - rectangle representing the ball

      • increaseTargetTimer

        public void increaseTargetTimer(int increase,
                                java.awt.Rectangle ballRect)
        Increases target timer which after exceeding a certain value invokes moveTarget method.
        Parameters:
        increase - amount by which the timer is increased.
        ballRect - rectangle representing the ball.

      • breakTarget

        public boolean breakTarget()
        Decreases target's durability by 1.
        Returns:
        return true when the target has just been destroyed.
